Text: haha, lol. have you even played it? there is like 0% propaganda, and about 100% more fun and more realistiv than, say, CS

LOL there is like 100% propaganda in this game.
If you dont see that you cant play the game coss your asleep!!
You dont even get to be the Good Guys !!
For those who doesn't know, this game isn't supported on linux any more. You can still get it to run with cedega though (not so good on wine at the moment).

Just a heads up for those that still want to play, in December 2011 the devs shut down the authentication and account servers for the "old" versions of America's Army. The community has fought back and we have our own authentication and account system setup now with 2.5 Assist. AA25.org or AAO25.com for more info.
